data.text:
Fortunately, we caught it in time and there's no more danger to 
your life but… considering your age as well, I can't recommend 
continuing as a trainer.
data.name: Doctor
data.processed:
<story>Fortunately, we caught it in time and there's no more danger to 
<story>your life but… considering your age as well, I can't recommend 
<story>continuing as a trainer.

data.text:
I see… it seems this day has finally come, hasn't it? 
…I'm sorry, Bell-chan.
data.name: Chief Trainer
data.processed:
<story>I see… it seems this day has finally come, hasn't it? 
<story>…I'm sorry, Bell-chan.

data.text: Trainer, it's not something you need to apologize for!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: <story>Trainer, it's not something you need to apologize for!

data.text:
I should be… I should be the one apologizing, 
for continuing to be as weak as I am…!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>I should be… I should be the one apologizing, 
<story>for continuing to be as weak as I am…!

data.text: In the end, Chief Trainer was forced to retire just like that.
data.processed: <story>In the end, Chief Trainer was forced to retire just like that.

data.text:
Trainer-san. From now on… 
please, I'll leave it to you.
data.name: Chief Trainer
data.processed:
<story>Trainer-san. From now on… 
<story>please, I'll leave it to you.

data.text:
It'll be fine…… you'll be fine. 
Definitely, if it's you――
data.name: Chief Trainer
data.processed:
<story>It'll be fine…… you'll be fine. 
<story>Definitely, if it's you――

data.text:
Two weeks after her formal resignation. The team 
was left to me, the sub-trainer, and it would be 
up to Mejiro Dober whether to stay or not.
data.processed:
<story>Two weeks after her formal resignation. The team 
<story>was left to me, the sub-trainer, and it would be 
<story>up to Mejiro Dober whether to stay or not.

data.text:
For that reason, it was necessary to hear 
what she thought about it, but…
data.processed:
<story>For that reason, it was necessary to hear 
<story>what she thought about it, but…

data.text:
Sorry, can we talk about this later? 
Right now… I want to get back to training, so for now…!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>Sorry, can we talk about this later? 
<story>Right now… I want to get back to training, so for now…!

data.text:
Sorry, right now, I don't have the leeway to think about that. 
For now, let me just focus on training…!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>Sorry, right now, I don't have the leeway to think about that. 
<story>For now, let me just focus on training…!

data.text:
Even though she believed in me…… I couldn't even live up to it 
even once. I still haven't even won once for Trainer……!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>Even though she believed in me…… I couldn't even live up to it 
<story>even once. I still haven't even won once for Trainer……!

data.text:
Even though she believed in me…… I couldn't even live up to it 
even once. I still haven't even won once for Trainer……!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>Even though she believed in me…… I couldn't even live up to it 
<story>even once. I still haven't even won once for Trainer……!

data.text:
There's only two weeks left! Until then, no matter what…… 
I absolutely, need to win a race……!!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>There's only two weeks left! Until then, no matter what…… 
<story>I absolutely, need to win a race……!!

data.text:
It's been two or three days since I took over, I've been swamped with 
work this whole time, and I haven't had any free time.
data.processed:
<story>It's been two or three days since I took over, I've been swamped with 
<story>work this whole time, and I haven't had any free time.

data.text:
But now, I've finally made some progress, eventually what came 
to mind was Mejiro Dober's overwhelming grief――

choices.text: I should go check on her……!

data.processed:
<story>But now, I've finally made some progress, eventually what came 
<story>to mind was Mejiro Dober's overwhelming grief――

data.text: Haa…… haaa……
data.name: Mejiro Dober

choices.text: Dober!!

data.processed: <story>Haa…… haaa……

data.name: Mejiro Dober

choices.text: Dober, you're pushing yourself too hard
Dober, you're pushing yourself too hard

data.processed: <story>……?! You……

data.text: ……?! Ah…… Sub-trainer……
data.name: Mejiro Dober

choices.text: Dober, you're pushing yourself too hard
Dober, you're pushing yourself too hard

data.processed: <story>……?! Ah…… Sub-trainer……

data.text: Shut up…… leave me alone!
data.name: Mejiro Dober

choices.text: But, if you keep going――
But, if you keep going――

data.processed: <story>Shut up…… leave me alone!

data.text:
……Please, just leave me alone. I told you already, 
right now just let me keep training……!
data.name: Mejiro Dober

choices.text: But, if you keep going――
But, if you keep going――

data.processed:
<story>……Please, just leave me alone. I told you already, 
<story>right now just let me keep training……!

data.text: I need to keep going though!! Because I'm weak!!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: <story>I need to keep going though!! Because I'm weak!!

data.text: I need to keep going though!! Because I'm weak!!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: <story>I need to keep going though!! Because I'm weak!!

data.text: I've always, always…… been weak!!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: <story>I've always, always…… been weak!!

data.text:
At first I thought I could win. Running as dignified as Bright, 
or showing everyone I can be as strong as Ryan――
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>At first I thought I could win. Running as dignified as Bright, 
<story>or showing everyone I can be as strong as Ryan――

data.text:
To show everyone that I, as a Mejiro Uma Musume, 
am just as outstanding as them. But……!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>To show everyone that I, as a Mejiro Uma Musume, 
<story>am just as outstanding as them. But……!

data.text:
――And now first place has crossed the goal! And one by one the 
others are finishing! Everyone, please give a big round of 
applause for everyone that did their best!
data.name: Event Commentator
data.processed:
<story>――And now first place has crossed the goal! And one by one the 
<story>others are finishing! Everyone, please give a big round of 
<story>applause for everyone that did their best!

data.text:
Ah! 8th place, Mejiro Dober-chan is rounding the final corner! 
She may have tripped and fallen at the start, but she hasn't 
given up and is doing her best!
data.name: Event Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Ah! 8th place, Mejiro Dober-chan is rounding the final corner! 
<story>She may have tripped and fallen at the start, but she hasn't 
<story>given up and is doing her best!

data.text: Haaa, haaa, haaa……!
data.name: Young Dober
data.processed: <story>Haaa, haaa, haaa……!

data.text:
Go on, you're doing great-! Do your best until the end-!! 
You're almost there～! Everyone's watching you～!
data.name: Crowd
data.processed:
<story>Go on, you're doing great-! Do your best until the end-!! 
<story>You're almost there～! Everyone's watching you～!

data.text: Haaa, haaa…… uuuuu……!!
data.name: Young Dober
data.processed: <story>Haaa, haaa…… uuuuu……!!

data.text:
Doing great……? Do your best……? It's fine……? 
I've never heard them say things like that to Ryan and Bright.
data.name: Young Dober
data.processed:
<story>Doing great……? Do your best……? It's fine……? 
<story>I've never heard them say things like that to Ryan and Bright.

data.text:
About Ryan and Bright, they're always saying things like how 
fast, how great they are…… but for me…… like this……!!
data.name: Young Dober
data.processed:
<story>About Ryan and Bright, they're always saying things like how 
<story>fast, how great they are…… but for me…… like this……!!

data.text:
――The result was miserable. Falling at the start, only being 
halfway when they reached the goal. Ever since then…… it's felt 
like everyone was laughing at me.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>――The result was miserable. Falling at the start, only being 
<story>halfway when they reached the goal. Ever since then…… it's felt 
<story>like everyone was laughing at me.

data.text:
Like they were saying how pathetic, how weak I was…… 
when I think that, my heart starts pounding strangely faster, 
and my hands and feet feel like they're not my own……!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>Like they were saying how pathetic, how weak I was…… 
<story>when I think that, my heart starts pounding strangely faster, 
<story>and my hands and feet feel like they're not my own……!

data.text:
Because of that, I can't even run properly……! 
These things that everyone can do naturally, I'm 
the only one that can't do them at all!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>Because of that, I can't even run properly……! 
<story>These things that everyone can do naturally, I'm 
<story>the only one that can't do them at all!

data.text:
Together with Trainer, I thought I had gotten a little bit 
stronger. But, now I can't rely on her any longer……!!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>Together with Trainer, I thought I had gotten a little bit 
<story>stronger. But, now I can't rely on her any longer……!!

data.text:
In that case! Even with all that, That's why I have to win a 
race! Even if I have to push myself, I have to keep going, I have 
no choice but to do it, right?!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>In that case! Even with all that, That's why I have to win a 
<story>race! Even if I have to push myself, I have to keep going, I have 
<story>no choice but to do it, right?!

data.text: Because I'm weak!! Even if I'm alone, I need to get stronger……!
data.name: Mejiro Dober

choices.text: ……but you're not alone

data.processed: <story>Because I'm weak!! Even if I'm alone, I need to get stronger……!

data.text: Ha……?
data.name: Mejiro Dober

choices.text: I'll support you
I'll support you

data.processed: <story>Ha……?

data.text:
……What? Now that you've replaced Trainer, I'll 
get stronger, are you saying it'll be fine? 
There's no way I can suddenly believe――!
data.name: Mejiro Dober

choices.text: Wrong, you're already a strong Uma Musume!
choices.processed: <size=36>Wrong, you're already a strong Uma Musume!</size>

choices.text: Wrong, you're already a strong Uma Musume!
choices.processed: <size=36>Wrong, you're already a strong Uma Musume!</size>

data.processed:

<story>There's no way I can suddenly believe――!

data.text:
Eh, you, didn't you hear a word I just said?! 
Didn't I say I was weak?! Ever since then, I've……!!
data.name: Mejiro Dober

choices.text: But this whole time, you've never given up
choices.processed: <size=39>But this whole time, you've never given up</size>

choices.text: But this whole time, you've never given up
choices.processed: <size=39>But this whole time, you've never given up</size>

data.processed:
<story>Eh, you, didn't you hear a word I just said?! 
<story>Didn't I say I was weak?! Ever since then, I've……!!

data.text:
Not yet, not yeeeeet!! 
――Aaaaaaaaaaah!!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>Not yet, not yeeeeet!! 
<story>――Aaaaaaaaaaah!!

data.text:
But, things can't keep going on like this…… it'll just turn 
in to a repeat of that last mock race, even I understand that.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>But, things can't keep going on like this…… it'll just turn 
<story>in to a repeat of that last mock race, even I understand that.

data.text:
But, things can't keep going on like this…… it'll just turn 
in to a repeat of that last mock race, even I understand that.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>But, things can't keep going on like this…… it'll just turn 
<story>in to a repeat of that last mock race, even I understand that.

data.text:
……That's why, speaking with you, is a kind of 
mental training! As the sub-trainer, hearing 
me out is part of your obligations, right?
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>……That's why, speaking with you, is a kind of 
<story>mental training! As the sub-trainer, hearing 
<story>me out is part of your obligations, right?

data.text:
That's why…… even if it's a little bit at a time. Just like 
this, speaking to someone I'm not familiar with, might help me 
mentally…… can you help me with that?
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>That's why…… even if it's a little bit at a time. Just like 
<story>this, speaking to someone I'm not familiar with, might help me 
<story>mentally…… can you help me with that?

data.text:
Even though she believed in me…… I couldn't even live up to it 
even once. I still haven't even won once for Trainer……!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>Even though she believed in me…… I couldn't even live up to it

Even though she believed in me…… I couldn't even live up to it

data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>Even though she believed in me…… I couldn't even live up to it

There's only 2 weeks left! Until then, no matter what…… 
I absolutely, need to win a race……!!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>There's only 2 weeks left! Until then, no matter what……

data.text:
Even now that's true. Mejiro Dober is continuing 
to fight on, even if she has to do it alone. 『Race 
and win』 ――always aiming for that.

choices.text: An Uma Musume who doesn't give up, can't be weak
choices.processed: <size=31>An Uma Musume who doesn't give up, can't be weak</size>

data.name: Mejiro Dober

choices.text: "Mejiro Dober" is a strong Uma Musume
choices.processed: <size=41>"Mejiro Dober" is a strong Uma Musume</size>

choices.text: "Mejiro Dober" is a strong Uma Musume

data.processed: <story>……!!

data.name: Mejiro Dober

choices.text: Dober! I'll be waiting for you!
Dober! I'll be waiting for you!

data.processed:
<story>Ah…… I'm…… 
<story>……～!!

data.text:
Mejiro Dober is a strong Uma Musume, even on her own. But 
still…… if she ever needs my support, I hope she'll come to me.
data.processed:
<story>Mejiro Dober is a strong Uma Musume, even on her own. But 
<story>still…… if she ever needs my support, I hope she'll come to me.

data.text: As she ran off, I called out like that with all I could muster.
data.processed: <story>As she ran off, I called out like that with all I could muster.
